about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of The 13th Doll: A Fan Game of The 7th Guest! Includes nearly 4.5 hours of audio from the game, including all puzzle tracks, all room background tracks, and the score of the cutscenes in the game.
-Over 150 tracks!
-Includes tracks with melodies by the Fatman!
-Nearly 4.5 hours of music!

short_description: Original Soundtrack, including 4 albums: Original Score, Puzzle Music, Background Music, and Bonus Music not heard in the game!
